Param.Name: meimeiTitleForm
Param.Value: Birthday message vicarious writing input form

Param.Name: meimei_leadMessage
Param.Value:
This is a web page for birthday message vicarious writing of Mei Sakai [SKE48 team E] (She will become 18 years old on the 13th December).
We collect the birthday messages in birth festival space of the meet-and-greet event meeting place.
But we think that many person cannot come to the meeting place.
If you have messages, please fill in below form.
We write for you with responsibility and present it to Mei with the birthday messages which collected in birth festival space of the meet-and-greet event meeting place.
(We may not accept it depending on contents.)

Param.Name: meimei_input_meimei_message
Param.Value: Message to Mei Sakai (80 character limit)

Param.Name: meimei_PresentedBy
Param.Value: Festival for the 18th anniversary of Mei Sakai(SKE48)'s birth Executive committee

Param.Name: meimei_thanksMessage
Param.Value:
Thank you for filling in this form.
Please continue supporting Mei Sakai.

Param.Name: meimei_error_meimei_name_is_empty
Param.Value: Please type your name or nickname.

Param.Name: meimei_error_meimei_message_is_empty
Param.Value: Please add any comments in below form.

Param.Name: meimei_error_system_error
Param.Value:
This is currently being adjusted.
Please wait a moment.
